Photography

Photography is the story
I fail to put into words.

Photography is the art, application. amd practice pf creating durable images by recording light. either electronically by means of an image sensor. pr chemically by means of a light-sensitive material such as photographic film.

What is
Photography?

About Founder

Alec Soth is an american photographer, based in Minneapolish, Soth makes "large scale American Projects" featuring the midwestern United States. New York Times art critic Hilarie M.Sheets wrote that he has made a "photographic career out of finding chemistry with strangers" and photgraphs "Loners and dreamers".
